title: Clent Settings Won't Save in Alpha Client
body: Whenever I am using the Alpha Client the client settings won't save to what I set them, for example the chat language filter. I open the settings in and deselect the check box next to "Enable Language Filter" and click "Done". Even when I immediately reopen the settings menu, all my changes have reverted to defaults. Is this just a temporary bug or am I just clicking something wrong?

replies.body: This sounds like a potential bug or issue with toggling in the client options.  For your specific issue, I recommend posting about it in the [Client Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) for that team to look at.  Thanks for the heads up!
